description: The Wishing Tree (Cassia bakeriana) is an amazing species of tree with a unique charm. It grows up to 20 feet tall and yields bright yellow blooms and lush, dark green leaves. It's best known for its fragrant flowers with a sweet and spicy scent, often used in traditional medicines and perfumes. This tree is known to bring good luck and fortune, hence the name wishing tree. It is also easy to care for and can adapt to a variety of climates, making it a great choice for any garden. Its beauty endures all year round and can be enjoyed in any season. With its beauty, lucky appeal and easy care, the Wishing Tree is definitely a worthwhile addition to any garden.
